Please provide as much detail as possible about your support request or feedback.

OpenCode Mobile is an iOS app client for your own private OpenCode server. Install this plugin in companion to the iOS app to get notifications support and remote availability always on.

Contact Information

If you encounter any issues or need direct support while using our app, please feel free to contact us through the following methods:

Twitter: @RodriMendoza2
Discord: rodri0864

We will respond to your message as soon as possible. Thank you for your support of our app!
